org.shared.net

Class Buffers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.net.Buffers

  • public class Buffers
extends Object
    A static utility class for Buffer manipulations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ByteBuffer append(ByteBuffer dst, ByteBuffer src)
      A facade for append(ByteBuffer, ByteBuffer, int).
      static ByteBuffer append(ByteBuffer dst, ByteBuffer src, int shift)
      Appends the contents of one buffer onto the end of another.
      static ByteBuffer resize(ByteBuffer src, int size)
      A facade for append(ByteBuffer, ByteBuffer, int).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • append

        public static final ByteBuffer append(ByteBuffer dst,
                ByteBuffer src,
                int shift)
        Appends the contents of one buffer onto the end of another.
        Parameters:
        dst - the destination ByteBuffer.
        src - the source ByteBuffer, which must be in the ready-to-read mode.
        shift - the power of two overallocation factor.
        Returns:
        the destination ByteBuffer, or a copy with capacity equal to the overallocation factor times the total amount of data.

      • append

        public static final ByteBuffer append(ByteBuffer dst,
                ByteBuffer src)
        A facade for append(ByteBuffer, ByteBuffer, int).

      • resize

        public static final ByteBuffer resize(ByteBuffer src,
                int size)
        A facade for append(ByteBuffer, ByteBuffer, int).
